--- format: html: code-fold: show code-summary: "Ocultar código" code-line-numbers: false code-annotations: false code-link: true code-tools: source: true toggle: true caption: "Código" code-overflow: scroll page-layout: full editor_options: chunk_output_type: console categories: - GEOM_AAA - GEOM_BBB - GEOM_CCC execute: eval: false echo: true warning: false title: "Semana 41" date: last-modified author: Víctor Gauto --- XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXX DESCRIPCIÓN DE LA FIGURA XXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX ::: {.column-page-right} ![Semana 41, 2025](semana_41.png) ::: ## Paquetes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(glue) library(ggtext) library(showtext) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: ## Estilos Colores. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} c1 <- "#000000" c2 <- "#000000" c3 <- "#000000" ``` ::: Fuentes: Ubuntu y JetBrains Mono. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} font_add( family = "ubuntu", regular = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Regular.ttf", bold = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Bold.ttf", italic = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Italic.ttf" ) font_add( family = "jet", regular = "././fuente/JetBrainsMonoNLNerdFontMono-Regular.ttf" ) showtext_auto() showtext_opts(dpi = 300) ``` ::: ## Epígrafe ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} fuente <- glue( "Datos: ", "{{tidytuesdayR}} semana 41, ", "---FUENTE---." ) autor <- glue("**Víctor Gauto**") icon_twitter <- glue("") icon_instagram <- glue("") icon_github <- glue("") icon_mastodon <- glue("󰫑") icon_bsky <- glue("") usuario <- glue("**vhgauto**") sep <- glue("**|**") mi_caption <- glue( "{fuente}
{autor} {sep} {icon_github} {icon_twitter} {icon_instagram} ", "{icon_mastodon} {icon_bsky} {usuario}" ) ``` ::: ## Datos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, 41) food <- tuesdata$food_security ``` ::: ## Procesamiento Me interesa... ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} filter(food, Area == "Argentina") |> distinct(Item) |> arrange(Item) |> print(n = 100) filter(food, Area == "Argentina") |> filter(str_detect(Item, "overweight")) |> distinct(Item) filter( food, Area == "Argentina" & str_detect(Item, "Number of moderately or severely food insecure") ) |> # distinct(Item) ggplot(aes(Year_Start, Value, group = Item, color = Item)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + theme_bw(base_size = 4) + theme( legend.position = "top" ) filter(food, Area == "Argentina") |> distinct(Item) |> arrange(Item) |> print(n = 100) ggplot(aes(Year_Start, Value, group = Item)) + geom_point() + geom_line() + facet_wrap(vars(Item), scales = "free_y") + theme_bw(base_size = 2) ``` ::: ## Figura Figura. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggplot() ``` ::: Guardo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_41.png", width = 30, height = 30, units = "cm" ) browseURL(paste0(getwd(), "/tidytuesday/2025/semana_41.png")) ``` :::
